```scss
// Property: windowPixelFormat
// Description: Set the pixel format for the Activity's Window.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.NavigationWindow, Ti.UI.TabGroup, Ti.UI.Window
'.window-pixel-format-a-8': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_A_8 }
'.window-pixel-format-la-88': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_LA_88 }
'.window-pixel-format-l-8': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_L_8 }
'.window-pixel-format-opaque': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_OPAQUE }
'.window-pixel-format-rgba-4444': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_RGBA_4444 }
'.window-pixel-format-rgba-5551': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_RGBA_5551 }
'.window-pixel-format-rgba-8888': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_RGBA_8888 }
'.window-pixel-format-rgbx-8888': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_RGBX_8888 }
'.window-pixel-format-rgb-332': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_RGB_332 }
'.window-pixel-format-rgb-565': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_RGB_565 }
'.window-pixel-format-rgb-888': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_RGB_888 }
'.window-pixel-format-translucent': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_TRANSLUCENT }
'.window-pixel-format-transparent': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_TRANSPARENT }
'.window-pixel-format-unknown': { windowPixelFormat: Ti.UI.Android.PIXEL_FORMAT_UNKNOWN }
```
